ygData.subject: Rune of Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: I too noticed that the Rune of Velious seemed to be an odd rune, that was not used in any spell creation. Many of us have been aware the Fire Spiral of
ygData.messageBody:
I too noticed that the Rune of Velious seemed to be an
odd rune, that was not used in any spell creation.
Many of us have been aware the Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor
requires 2 runes, Nagafen and Al'Kabor, and that this
spell is bugged with research, and fails to combine.
Well, I decided to take a chance, and combined the
Al'Kabor with Velious. Bingo, I'm now the proud owner
of the Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor spell. :)

I also had Energy Storm fail last night, didn't
combine properly. I used the last of the runes needed,
or I would have tried switching Velious into that mix
too.

Quil, wizard from Bertoxxulous
